name: Brothers DX
description:
BROTHERS DX

Escape a forest while strange purple men try to kill you. Use your brother as a weapon and kill them first! 

It's kill or be killed baby!! Die die die!! 

He's also got a very spongey skull, so he makes an excellent bounce pad.

Controls

X - Jump

C - Throw

Arrow Keys - Move

R - Restart Level

Esc - Quit

Tips

- Hold the jump button while bouncing off your little brother for a bigger jump!

Troubleshooting

Please send any and all feedback/thoughts/bugs on the Discord!

https://discord.gg/RUtkzjUKpe

Readme and description written by Henry Hoffman esq.
